title: All Hallows' Moon
description: The good girl has become a very bad werewolf...Rylie has moved to her aunt’s ranch where she can learn to safely control her murderous werewolf side. But the werewolf hunter she fell in love with over the summer has found her again. Seth has brought his werewolf-hunting family along with him, and they aren't nearly as sympathetic to Rylie.Rylie struggles to reconcile her feelings while Seth fights to do what’s right. But what is right--obeying desire or duty?
author: S.M. Reine
